quote_first: Exactly where he’d seen the two figures, the time at which they continued up the mountain, and the fact that they appeared to be in no difficulty as they disappeared into the mist. When he’d finished, he checked his watch:
title: Paths of Glory
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first: She didn’t emerge again until 6:32 p.m. She was dressed in her civilian clothes, and headed in the direction of Summers’s flat, stopping on the way to pick up one of his suits from the dry cleaner’s. At
quote_last: she let herself into the house.
title: Turn a Blind Eye
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_last:
, and I got to be home by—”
“Oh, shut up,” says I. “I had an appointment as chief performer at an inquest at seven, and I’m not kicking about not keeping it.”
title: Roads of Destiny
author: O. Henry

title: The Hot Rock
author: Donald E Westlake
